author: donaldp
msg: Start to more fully integrate the Excalibur Loader into Phoenix.
This commit just supports the old behaviour of Phoenix (ie jars are stored in SAR-INF/lib/*.jar and .class files in SAR-INF/classes/).
User defined ClassLoader trees are coming next ...

author: donaldp
msg: Start to implement a LoaderResolver in preparation for converting Phoenix to a more comprehensive ClassLoader Management.
